attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
99% of people have it, it's a useful everyday item, can save lives as well as keep people in touch with friends and family, so lets tax it!
Sorry but this is stupid, not a stealth tax I agree but dont hide under the "Broadband" umberella making it sound that only the well-off who have broadband will pay, no, its everyone with a land-line.
You are going too far!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
